title: Evidence Based Medicine on FHIR Implementation Guide Code System
name: Cs_ebm_ig
description: This code system is a temporary workspace while drafting the Evidence Based Medicine Implementation Guide. It may not be stable and may not be persistent.

concept.definition: The main contact, specific contact purpose not specified.
The contact is the registrant of the report.
The contact is serving a coordination role.
The contact for requesting permission for use.
